name: TWEAK Footwear
tag_list: shoes, internet, ecommerce, facebook-application, youtube, crowd-source, open-source
overview:
TWEAK Footwear is all about connecting, sharing, designing, and selling shoes using social media.

TWEAK Footwear created a social media application to capture user-generated comments, photos, and videos - Open source shoe design! TWEAK brings large communities of popular YouTube channels together to ask get consumers to participate in the shoe design process. Tens of millions have seen TWEAK’s videos promoting open source shoe design. Viewers are directed from the videos to the TWEAK Design application that captures user generated shoe designs. Anyone can submit his or her own shoe design. Each shoe project receives thousands of designs and we use the best submissions to create the final shoe.

Here are some links to our brand:

TWEAK Design Application http://apps.facebook.com/tweakfootwearpro/

TWEAK Facebook Page http://www.facebook.com/tweakshoes

Official Website http://www.tweakfootwear.com
